CustomField.formula: IF(Account.Is_Strategic_Account__c, 'Attendance required to proceed to next Stage', IF(Amount > 10000000, 'Attendance required to proceed to next Stage', IF((TCV_Complexity_Rating__c + Product_Complexity_Rating__c + Standard_Australia_Post_Contract_Rating__c + Standard_Product_Features_Rating__c + Standard_Rate_Cards_Rating__c + Standard_Operational_Req_Rating__c + Implementation_Onboard_Complexity_Rating__c) > 7 , 'Attendance required to proceed to next Stage', 'Attendance not required')))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field will indicate if your deal is required to attend Commit to Action or Deal Desk forum (based on size, products and complexity)
CustomField.label: B&G Forum attendance
